text: You're confused and your head hurts. As if you have been hit. You look around the room that is dimly lit by the rising full moon. Are you at home?

No... You remember now. You are in a small bungalow on vacation, the well-deserved vacation with your friend on a paradise island. Speaking of, where is your friend? You look around the room. You get a strange feeling in your gut. Something's wrong.
You should CHECK the ROOM or your friend's BED. Or maybe you should just GO somewhere. You hear a faint noise from OUTSIDE.

Objects.Name: room
Text: The bungalow room is tiny. There is only room for two beds, a small cabinet with a television on top that barely fits. You notice the open BATHROOM door that's next to the entrance DOOR.

Objects.Name: bed
Text: You see a silhouette that resembles your friend on the bed. You touch your friend gently but realize that it was all an illusion. It's just the cover and pillows. Your friend is not here.

text: You're back in the bungalow where you woke up.
Scenes.Title: INT. BUNGALOW - NIGHT

Objects.Name: room
Text: The bungalow room is tiny. There is only room for two beds, a small cabinet with a television on top that barely fits. You notice the open BATHROOM door that's next to the entrance DOOR.

Objects.Name: bed
Text: You see a silhouette that resembles your friend on the bed. You touch your friend gently but realize that it was all an illusion. It's just the cover and pillows. Your friend is not here.

text: The full moon light illuminates the balcony. Even though it is hot outside the balcony tiles are chilly and slippery.
There is another bungalow nearby. You see a shadowy figure hunched over the other bungalow''s balcony.
You can GO DOWN the stairs to get to the other bungalow or GO back INSIDE your own bungalow.
Scenes.Title: EXT. BUNGALOW BALCONY - NIGHT

text: You're standing between your bungalow and the the neighbouring bungalow. The vehicle you and your friend rented is gone but the neighbour's JEEP is still parked.
You can GO back HOME to your bungalow or walk to up the stairs to your neighbour's BUNGALOW where the shadowy figure is.
Scenes.Title: EXT. BETWEEN BUNGALOWS - NIGHT

text: You see the shadowy figure hunching over the balcony railing.
You can GO INSIDE or GO DOWN the stairs.
Scenes.Title: EXT. NEIGHBOUR BUNGALOW BALCONY - NIGHT
